channel.title: The Beatz and Bobz Show - Nu Skool Break Beat Podcast
channel.description: The Breakspoll awarding wining Podcast from Breakbeat recording artists and worldwide breaks DJs Ben and Lex . Bringing you the hottest in upfront Breakbeat, Nu Skool Breaks, Bass music dubs, with promos and exclusives from APE Music as well. Featuring tracks from Baobinga and ID, Plumps Djs, Krafty Kuts, Freerange Djs, Peo de Pitte, Elite Force, Meat Katie, Calvertron, Zodiac Cartel, Afghan Headspin, Rico Tubbs, Fake Blood, Jack Beats, Dub Pistols, Nick Thayer, Noisia, 601, 2 Bit Thugs, Jinx, Diplo, The Loops Of Fury, and so much more. Thank you for supporting us and helping us win best podcast at Breakspoll 2010. Head over to www.benandlex.co.uk for more info.

item.title: Beatz and Bobz Show | NSB Radio | 03/10/11
item.itunes:author: Ben and Lex
item.description:
No guests the week just a proper 2 hour tear out of breaks, bass music, dubstep, drumstep, jungle techno! Lock yourself in and enjoy the ride.

01. Slyde 'Hold Tight'
02. Baymont Bross 'Where's The Beat'
03. 2 Bit Thugs ft. Koaste Farrah 'Get Next To You (Club Mix)'
04. DJ Icey 'Discombobulator'
05. The Omega Men 'Girls Noize'
06. Electrosexual and Scream Club ft Sue Denim 'Party Time (Flore's Ravin' Remix)'
07. The Don ft Serocee 'Noisses (Hostage Remix)'
08. Mz Bratt 'Selecta (2 Bit Thugs ReRub)'
09. Unique 3 'Rocks The Bass (Si Begg's Warehouse Mix)'
10. Radiokillaz 'Murda Sound'
11. Radiokillaz 'Murda Sound (J-Trick Moombahcore Remix)'
12. Dillon Francis 'Masta Blasta'
13. Yoof (Sonz Of Mecha) 'Back 2 Hackney'
14. 601 'Pressure (Let It Go)'
15. Emeli Sande 'Heaven (Pyramid Refix)'
16. Cut La Roc 'Freeze (Ben and Lex Remix)'
17. Aquasky 'You Take Me There (Cutline Remix)'
18. Dub Elements 'Future Anthem'
19. 2 Intiman ft Foreign Beggers 'Hit That (Calvertron Remix)'
20. Kid Digital ft Profit 'Done With That'
21. Far Too Loud 'Hear Dem Style'
22. Willow Smith vs Rose Royce 'Whip My Hair (Peo de Pitte Remix)'
23. 2 Bit Thugs ft. Koaste Farrah 'Get Next To You (Tomb Crew No Paon No Gain Remixxx)'
24. Ramos and Supreme 'Crowd Control (The Boogeyman and Haylo Dubstep Remix)'
25. Skream 'Burning Up (Tim Reaper's Straight Up Beasting Remix)'
26. Rico Tubbs 'Maddness (Killabits Remix)'
27. Warrior One ft Durrty Goodz 'The Jump Off'
28. Aquasky 'Taken Over'
29. Ms Dynamite 'Neva Soft (Pyramid Refix)'
30. Yoof (Sonz Of Mecha) 'Murderer'

item.title: Beatz and Bobz Show | NSB Radio | 20/06/11
item.itunes:author: Ben and Lex
item.description:
Ben and Lex Hot Mix

01. Dillon Francis 'Masta Blasta' [Mad Decent]
02. Emalkay 'Crusader' [Dub Police]
03. Sgt Slick and Chuckie 'Let The Bass Kick Like This'
04. 601 'This Years Champion' [Passenger]
05. Ms Dynamite 'Neva Soft (Pyramid Refix)' [CDR]
06. Aquasky ft LadyRolla 'Feel The Sound (601 Remix)' [Passenger]
07. Document One 'Bubble and Squeek'
08. Willow Smith vs Rose Royce 'Whip My Hair (Peo de Pitte Remix)' [CDR]
09. Malente and Jay Robinson ft Yo! Majesty 'Cherry Pop (Botnek Remix)'
10. Drop Top and Figure 'We Are Warriors (Calvertron Remix)'
11. Freestylers vs Wizard 'Killasound' [Freestylers]
12. 2 Bad Mice 'Bombscare (Robb G and Ground Control Remix)' [CDR]
13. Heavy D 'Nuttin But Luv (Hype Jones 2011 Remix)' [CDR]
14. Datisk 'Firepower'
15. Pyramid 'Ready For Blast Off'
16. Africa Hitech 'Out In The Streets (VIP)' [Warp]
17. Rusko vs Bassnectar 'Hold On To Your 808' [CDR]

GIRA - BREAKBEAT CHANNEL PODCAST

Run Riot Guest Mix

01. Vespers ft MC Vex 'Put Down The Gun' [Pop and Lock]
02. Flore ft Rodney P 'Get It In (Hanuman Tribe Remix)' [White]
03. Kid Digital ft MC Kyla 'Feel It (Destroyers Vs Aggresivnes Remix)' [The Pooty Club]
04. Cage Page 'Challenger (Hironimus Bosch Remix)' [V.I.M]
05. Refracture 'Hate On This' [Dusted Breaks]
06. Just For Fun 'Onzeground (Direct Input Remix)' [Kick It]
07. Feed Me 'Muscle Rollers' [Mau5trap]
08. Noisia 'Split the Atom' [Vision]
09. Ninetynine 'Revenge' [Dga Fau]
10. Far Too Loud 'Start the Party' [Funkatech]
11. Damn Horns 'The Freak Out' [Rocstar]
12. Karton 'Girl With Vertigo' [Sound of Habib]
13. JSK 'Skankah (ETC!ETC! Remix)' [THaF]
14. Surebut Kids 'Drunk in This (Hugga Thugg Remix)' [Klub Kids]
15. The Damn Bell Doors 'Calcutta (Hanuman Tribe Remix)' [MMAN]
16. Mesmer 'Seductive (Kid Digital Remix)' [Scarcity]
17. Stanton Warriors 'Bushido' [Punks]
18. Destroy Disco 'Riding High Dodge (Fuski Remix)' [Klub Kids]
19. Surebut Kids 'Drunk in This (Phetsta Remix)' [Klub Kids]
20. Benga 'United Kingdom' [White]
21. Far Too Loud 'Start The Party (Specimen A Remix)' [Funkatech]
22. Ribs and IG88 'Monkey Wrench' [Valium]
23. James Blake 'Limit to Your Love' [Polydor]
24. Sleigh Bells 'Infinity Guitars' [Mom+Pop Music]
25. Feed Me 'Cloudburn' [Mau5trap]
26. Chase and Status ft Dizzee 'Heavy' [MTA]

Run Riot Top 10

01. Digitalism 'Antibiotics (Original Mix)' [Cooperative Music]
02. Spor 'Pacifica (Chasing Shadows Remix)' [Lifted Music]
03. Guau '3D (Original Mix)' [Elektroshok Records]
04. Karton 'Girl With Vertigo (Original Mix)' [Sound Of Habib]
05. MC Kyla and Stonewash 'Undertow (Kid Digital Remix)' [Empathy Recordings]
06. Mesmer 'Seductive (Kid Digital Remix)' [Scarcity Records]
07. Maezetti 'Killem Again (Hirshee Remix)' [Quack Recordings]
08. Digital Pizza and Left/Right 'Every Body (Access Denied Mix)' [Downbeat]
09. Benga 'Transformers (Original Mix)' [Oi! Recordings]
10. Crushington and Black Sun Empire 'Shudder (Original Mix)' [Shadows Of The Empire]

Sunsha Mini Mix

01. BSD and Access Denied 'Ultiman (Intro)'
02. 2 Past The Noize '7b'
03. Quadrat Beat 'Something (Dirty and Acid Remix)'
04. Under This 'Ruff Stuff'
05. Sunsha 'Decoder'
06. Cyberpunkers 'Fuck The System (Access Denied Remix)'
07. Bill Vega and New Decade 'Life Eats (The Funkrash Remix)'
08. Hardnoise '75 Cents (Deenk Remix)'

item.title: Beatz and Bobz Show | Tim Healy Guest Mix | 06/06/11
item.itunes:author: Ben and Lex
item.description:
Packed show this week with an exclusive APE Music showcase mix and a guest mix form Tim Healey.

01. Freear and Ekaj 'Gizmo Stomp (Jinx In Dub Remix)' [APE Music]
02. Dj Prosper and Old Skool Nemo Vs Benjamin Vial 'Bad Bowys (Projectiles Remix)' [APE Music]
03. 601 'I Can't Take It' [APE Music]
04. Freerange DJs 'Drop That Beat (Lethalness Remix)' [APE Music]
05. Freerange DJs 'Body Switch' [APE Music]
06. 601 'Whoop' [APE Music]
07. Freear and Ekaj 'Gizmo Stomp (Snareophobe Remix)' [APE Music]
08. Freerange DJs 'Back To The Old Jack' [APE Music]
09. Freear and Ekaj 'Gizmo Stomp (Resistance Remix)' [APE Music]
10. Freerange DJs 'Party Killer' [APE Music]
11. Ben and Lex 'Makaton (VIP)' [APE Music]
12. Freerange Djs 'Your Mind Your Passion' [APE Music]
13. 601 'White Out' [APE Music]
14. Enough Weapons 'Dropping Morgan A Line' [APE Music]
15. Cut La Roc 'Looking For The Deep Bass (Beatmonkeys Remix)' [APE Music]
16. Afghan Headspin 'True (Fred V Remix)' [APE Music]

** Tim Healy Guest Mix **

17. Tim Healey and Atomic Drop ft Sir Real 'Take Control' [Surfer Rosa Records]
18. Chris Lake and Nelski 'Colours' [Rising]
19. Boys Will Be Boys 'We Rock' [Musical Freedom]
20. Alex Gray 'Small Town Boy' [Moda]
21. Tommy Trash 'The End' [Downright]
22. Bass Jackers 'Mush Mush' [Musical Freedom]
23. Karton 'Girl With Vertigo' [CDR]
24. Green Velvet 'Answer Phone (Santiago and Bushido Remix)' [RELIEF]
25. Hardwell 'Encoded (Dadlife Remix)' [Revealed]
26. Far Too Loud 'Don't Let Go' [CDR]
27. Cubicle 'Rhinocerose' [V2]
28. Dirtyloud 'Needle' [Surfer Rosa Records]

item.title: The Beatz and Bobz Show | NSB Radio | 04/04/11
item.itunes:author: Ben and Lex
item.description:
We return from our hols and what a show we have in store for you this evening, plenty of bangers and a guest mix from Rennie Pilgrem rolling on his 140bpm tip

01. Gella and Jinx 'Start The Panic' [Subslayers]
02. Rack n Ruin ft Jessie Ware 'Soundclash (Warrior one Remix)' [Black Butter]
03. Dom Almond 'Rinse It Out Live' [Hardcore Beats]
04. I.D. 'Once Again' [Bass Music]
05. Spangled Ballet 'English Teeth (Redux Remix)' [Trickery Collective]
06. Viro and ROb Analyze 'Wannu B (Plump Djs Remix)' [Noise Porn]
07. Flore 'Pum Pum Gal (I.D. Remix)' [Botchit and Scarper]
08. Marco Del Horno v Swerve 'HO! Riddim (Funtcase Remix)' [Black Butter]
09. Tim Healy vs Calvertron ft Sirreal and Pippa Trix'Rock It Roll It' [Surfer Rosa]
10. Fatboy Slim 'Gangster Trippin 2011 (Lazy Rich Remix)' [Skint]
11. Jordan and Santero 'Rude Boy' [CDR]
12. Rico Tubbs 'Gangsters (Calvertron Remix)' [Bass=Win]
13. Splitloop 'Toastclub' [Toastclub]
14. DJ Zinc vs Jack Beats 'Nexx The Bassline (Plaza De Funk Remash)' [CDR]
15. Dj Yoda and Nick Thayer 'Pop Music' [Jam City]
16. Zodiac Cartel vs Fake Blood vs Daft Punk 'Mashup on Mars' [CDR]
17. Herve 'Together (DJ Fresh Future Jungle Mix)' [All Around The World]

/* Rennie Pilgrem Guest Mix */

18. Ben and Lex 'Ruffneck (Jinx Mix)'
19. Rack N Ruin 'Mindscape'
20. Rennie Pilgrem 'Erica's Fix'
21. Plump Djs 'Light Fantastic'
22. Rennie Pilgrem 'One Time'
23. Rennie Pilgrem 'Here We Go'
24. RackNRuin 'Pull Up That'
25. Emalkay 'Crusader'
26. Pyramid ft Julie Thompson 'Cruel'
27. Jurassik and Codec 'Hit Dat (Rennie Pilgrem Mix)'
28. Pyramid 'Ready 4 Blast Off'
29. Pyramid ft Banton 'Gunman'
30. Gella Vs Jinx 'Start The Panic'

*/ End
item.itunes:subtitle: The Beatz and Bobz Show | NSB Radio | 04/04/11
item.itunes:summary:
We return from our hols and what a show we have in store for you this evening, plenty of bangers and a guest mix from Rennie Pilgrem rolling on his 140bpm tip
01. Gella and Jinx 'Start The Panic' [Subslayers] 02. Rack n Ruin ft Jessie Ware 'Soundclash (Warrior one Remix)' [Black Butter] 03. Dom Almond 'Rinse It Out Live' [Hardcore Beats] 04. I.D. 'Once Again' [Bass Music] 05. Spangled Ballet 'English Teeth (Redux Remix)' [Trickery Collective] 06. Viro and ROb Analyze 'Wannu B (Plump Djs Remix)' [Noise Porn] 07. Flore 'Pum Pum Gal (I.D. Remix)' [Botchit and Scarper] 08. Marco Del Horno v Swerve 'HO! Riddim (Funtcase Remix)' [Black Butter] 09. Tim Healy vs Calvertron ft Sirreal and Pippa Trix'Rock It Roll It' [Surfer Rosa] 10. Fatboy Slim 'Gangster Trippin 2011 (Lazy Rich Remix)' [Skint] 11. Jordan and Santero 'Rude Boy' [CDR] 12. Rico Tubbs 'Gangsters (Calvertron Remix)' [Bass=Win] 13. Splitloop 'Toastclub' [Toastclub] 14. DJ Zinc vs Jack Beats 'Nexx The Bassline (Plaza De Funk Remash)' [CDR] 15. Dj Yoda and Nick Thayer 'Pop Music' [Jam City] 16. Zodiac Cartel vs Fake Blood vs Daft Punk 'Mashup on Mars' [CDR] 17. Herve 'Together (DJ Fresh Future Jungle Mix)' [All Around The World]
/* Rennie Pilgrem Guest Mix */
18. Ben and Lex 'Ruffneck (Jinx Mix)' 19. Rack N Ruin 'Mindscape' 20. Rennie Pilgrem 'Erica's Fix' 21. Plump Djs 'Light Fantastic' 22. Rennie Pilgrem 'One Time' 23. Rennie Pilgrem 'Here We Go' 24. RackNRuin 'Pull Up That' 25. Emalkay 'Crusader' 26. Pyramid ft Julie Thompson 'Cruel' 27. Jurassik and Codec 'Hit Dat (Rennie Pilgrem Mix)' 28. Pyramid 'Ready 4 Blast Off' 29. Pyramid ft Banton 'Gunman' 30. Gella Vs Jinx 'Start The Panic'
